node.contents: Did you sign the application with the correct key?

node.contents: I'm using the debug certificate. How do I sign my app? I presume this is different to exporting a signed application?

astNode.text: I'm using the debug certificate. How do I sign my app? I presume this is different to exporting a signed application?

node.contents: In eclipse right click on project -> Android Tools -> Export Signed Application Package. For development purposes you should generate a second api key, that works with your debug certificate.

astNode.text: In eclipse right click on project -> Android Tools -> Export Signed Application Package. For development purposes you should generate a second api key, that works with your debug certificate.

node.contents: Hi, I did that and it still doesn't work... I'm really stuck!

astNode.text: Hi, I did that and it still doesn't work... I'm really stuck!

node.contents: I've searched all the other threads and followed the official guide, but I still can't display a map on my android device.

astNode.text: I've searched all the other threads and followed the official guide, but I still can't display a map on my android device.

node.contents: I've generated the md5 fingerprint, uploaded it to google, copied the key into my show_map.xml file, enabled INTERNET permissions, etc. and it still won't work!

astNode.text: I've generated the md5 fingerprint, uploaded it to google, copied the key into my show_map.xml file, enabled INTERNET permissions, etc. and it still won't work!

node.contents: I've even tried with Android 2.1 instead of 2.2 (which I'm currently using).

astNode.text: I've even tried with Android 2.1 instead of 2.2 (which I'm currently using).

node.contents: Any help anyone can offer is greatly appreciated.

astNode.text: Any help anyone can offer is greatly appreciated.

node.contents: Ok, after a night's sleep, I figured it out...

node.contents: Google map displaying only blank tiles android

astNode.text: Google map displaying only blank tiles android

node.contents: <uses-permission ...> must be a child of <manifest>, not <application>

astNode.text: <uses-permission ...> must be a child of <manifest>, not <application>
